name: Clockwork Trouble
description:
A small game in arcade machine style I made with the Godot Engine.  Survive waves of enemies and collect treasure before the time runs out! Two game modes available! 

I might add some features over time (eg. a boss per mode) and more games to the arcade machine in the future.

Music by Joex3 (https://www.youtube.com/c/Joex3)

I'm always happy to receive feedback. ^^

Beware: There is a bug in the Engine which messes up screenshots and recordings in fullscreen (Windows only).
